official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the continued use of certain lands within the Sequoia National Park by portions of an existing hydroelectric project.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to permit the continued use of Sequoia National Park, California, lands for the Kaweah Project of Southern California Edison Company.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the continued use of certain lands within the Sequoia National Park by portions of an existing hydroelectric project.
